PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2010-13352010-10-28,  FIN,  ,  , 
ActBank Act
SubjectExemption for Public Notices or Documents (Banks and Bank Holding Companies) Regulations
PrecisEXEMPTION FOR PUBLIC NOTICES OR DOCUMENTS (BANKS AND BANK HOLDING COMPANIES) REGULATIONS, in order to set out prescribed circumstances under which an exemption may be granted for documents required to be made public or submitted to the Minister of Finance, Superintendent of Financial Institutions, Commissioner of the Financial Consumer Agency of Canada, or the Bank of Canada.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2010-0238 Publication Date: 2010-11-10
AttachmentsAttachment
